name: 陳維鈞
objective:
本課程介紹有關化合物半導體的材料之基本性質與應用，課程內容包含材料特性、磊晶工程與技術、磊晶分析等面向進行授課，並著重於化合物半導體磊晶實務經驗及化合物半導體光電元件之應用。
The course covers the fundamental properties and applications of compound semiconductors, including materials properties, epitaxial growth and technology, epitaxial materials analysis, and focuses on practical experiences in compound semiconductor epitaxy and the application of compound semiconductor optoelectronic devices.
